definition: A creative process involving the conception, planning, and arrangement of visual elements, often with the purpose of creating functional and aesthetically pleasing objects, spaces, or experiences. It is commonly employed in various fields such as architecture, fashion, product development, and graphic arts.

examples.german: Das Design des Autos ist sehr modern.
examples.english: The design of the car is very modern.

examples.german: Sie hat ein Auge für gutes Design.
examples.english: She has an eye for good design.

examples.german: Das neue Logo hat ein einfaches und ansprechendes Design.
examples.english: The new logo has a simple and appealing design.

examples.german: Das Design der Webseite ist benutzerfreundlich.
examples.english: The design of the website is user-friendly.

examples.german: Er studiert Produktdesign an der Universität.
examples.english: He is studying product design at the university.
